values.name: Build Broken
values.description: The source code committed for this issue has possibly broken the build.

values.name: Building
values.description: Source code has been committed, and JIRA is waiting for the code to be built before moving to the next status.

values.name: Closed
values.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

values.name: In Progress
values.description: This issue is being actively worked on at the moment by the assignee.

values.name: Open
values.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

values.name: Reopened
values.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

values.name: Resolved
values.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
